awd_titl_txt: Thrusting Sequence in Central Utah Foreland From Deformationof Syntectonic Basin - Margin Conglomerates
awd_abstract_narration: This study will combine stratigraphic and structural mapping             and palynological analyses to obtain the detailed movement history              of individual thrusts in the Sevier orogenic belt of central Utah.              Timing of the inception of the Sevier thrusts is presently                      unconstrained.  Conglomeratic sediments were deformed                           syndespostionally by thrusts, and these conglomeratic rocks can be              traced laterally into pollen-bearing fine-grained sedimentary                   rocks.  Thus the timing of thrust inception can be obtained.  The               results of this study will improve our understanding of the early               stages of thrust belt development in the Sevier orogen, and also                in other tectonic environments.
